title: Update on the Pope’s Planned Visit to Turin in 2015
post:
It is part of the journey of faith for many. Those who live in the London, England area and wish to go deeper and listen to some interesting talks on faith in our increasingly sceptical Western world may like to go here:
 http://rcdow.org.uk/faith/faith-matters/faith-matters-advent-2014/
author: Louis
